languages.text: {n}Вы понимаете, что подверглись воздействию артефакта. Похоже, что ваш вокс был зачарован при помощи вашей же крови, похищенной Кунрадом в день вашей стычки. Артефакт должен был сработать как сифон, вытянув душу у того, кто откроет контейнер и у всех окружающих — но команда несчастного корабля приняла удар на себя. Остаточное воздействие артефакта не настолько сильно, чтобы навредить вам всерьез. {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы понимаете, что подверглись воздействию артефакта. Похоже, что ваш вокс был зачарован при помощи вашей же крови, похищенной Кунрадом в день вашей стычки. Артефакт должен был сработать как сифон, вытянув душу у того, кто откроет контейнер и у всех окружающих — но команда несчастного корабля приняла удар на себя. Остаточное воздействие артефакта не настолько сильно, чтобы навредить вам всерьез. {/n}

languages.text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы понимаете, что подверглись воздействию артефакта. Похоже, что ваш вокс был зачарован при помощи вашей же крови, похищенной Кунрадом в день вашей стычки. Артефакт должен был сработать как сифон, вытянув душу у того, кто откроет контейнер и у всех окружающих — но команда несчастного корабля приняла удар на себя. Остаточное воздействие артефакта не настолько сильно, чтобы навредить вам всерьез. {/n}

The artifact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opens the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artifact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

{n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーティファクトの影響を受けていたことに気づいた。どうやらあなたヴォクスはあなたの血で満たされていて、クンラッドが自分と対決した日に盗んでいたようだ。アーティファクトはサイフォンのように働き、容器を開けた者とその周囲の者の魂を抜き取るはずだったが、運悪く船のクルーがその攻撃の矢面に立たされたのだ。アーティファクトに残存している影響力は、こちらに深刻な害を与えるほど強くはないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遺物の影響を受けていたことに気づいた。どうやらこのヴォクスは自分の血で満たされていて、クンラッドが自分と対決した日に盗んでいたようだ。遺物はサイフォンのように働き、容器を開けた者とその周囲の者の魂を抜き取るはずだったが、運悪く船のクルーがその攻撃の矢面に立たされたのだ。遺物に残存している影響力は、こちらに深刻な害を与えるほど強くはないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你意识到，你受到了这件造物的影响。看起来，这件音阵装置被施加了魔力，附魔的媒介正是你自己的鲜血，也就是你们之前对峙时，昆拉德从你身上窃走的鲜血。只要有人打开了容器，这件造物就会像虹吸管一样，吸干周围所有人的灵魂，而这艘命运多舛的飞船上船员，则不幸沦为这场袭击的主要受害者。如今这件造物已经失去了力量，它残存的力量并不足以对你造成严重伤害。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你意识到，你受到了这件造物的影响。看起来，这件音阵装置被施加了魔力，附魔的媒介正是你自己的鲜血，也就是你们之前对峙时，昆拉德从你身上窃走的鲜血。只要有人打开了容器，这件造物就会像虹吸管一样，吸干周围所有人的灵魂，而这艘命运多舛的飞船上船员，则不幸沦为这场袭击的主要受害者。如今这件造物已经失去了力量，它残存的力量并不足以对你造成严重伤害。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te das cuenta de que el artefacto te ha afectado. Parece que el voco estaba encantado con tu propia sangre, extraída por Kunrad el día de vuestro enfrentamiento. El artefacto debía funcionar como un sifón, drenando el alma de quien abriera el contenedor y cuantos lo rodearan... pero la tripulación de la nave funesta se llevó la peor parte del ataque. Los efectos residuales del artefacto son insuficientes para hacerte daño de verdad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te das cuenta de que el artefacto te ha afectado. Parece que el voco estaba encantado con tu propia sangre, extraída por Kunrad el día de vuestro enfrentamiento. El artefacto debía funcionar como un sifón, drenando el alma de quien abriera el contenedor y cuantos lo rodearan... pero la tripulación de la nave funesta se llevó la peor parte del ataque. Los efectos residuales del artefacto son insuficientes para hacerte daño de verdad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous comprenez que vous subissez les effets de l'artefact. Votre vox semble avoir été enchanté avec votre propre sang, volé par Kunrad le jour de votre confrontation. L'artefact était censé fonctionner comme un siphon, aspirant l'âme de quiconque ouvrirait le conteneur et toute personne alentour, mais l'équipage du vaisseau détruit a absorbé le gros de l'attaque. Heureusement, les effets résiduels ne sont pas assez puissants pour vous faire le moindre mal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous comprenez que vous subissez les effets de l'artefact. Votre vox semble avoir été enchanté avec votre propre sang, volé par Kunrad le jour de votre confrontation. L'artefact était censé fonctionner comme un siphon, aspirant l'âme de quiconque ouvrirait le conteneur et toute personne alentour, mais l'équipage du vaisseau détruit a absorbé le gros de l'attaque. Heureusement, les effets résiduels ne sont pas assez puissants pour vous faire le moindre mal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst, dass du dem Effekt des Artefakts ausgesetzt warst. Anscheinend wurde dein Vox mit deinem eigenen Blut verzaubert. das Kunrad am Tag eurer Konfrontation gestohlen hat. Das Artefakt sollte die Seele von jedem absaugen, der den Behälter öffnet, und von allen in dessen Nähe – aber die Hauptenergie des Angriffs wurde bereits durch die Crew des unglückseligen Schiffs verbraucht. Die Restauswirkungen des Artefakts sind nicht stark genug, um dir ernsthaft zu schaden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst, dass du dem Effekt des Artefakts ausgesetzt warst. Anscheinend wurde dein Vox mit deinem eigenen Blut verzaubert. das Kunrad am Tag eurer Konfrontation gestohlen hat. Das Artefakt sollte die Seele von jedem absaugen, der den Behälter öffnet, und von allen in dessen Nähe – aber die Hauptenergie des Angriffs wurde bereits durch die Crew des unglückseligen Schiffs verbraucht. Die Restauswirkungen des Artefakts sind nicht stark genug, um dir ernsthaft zu schaden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eserin etkisi altında olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa karşı karşıya geldiğiniz gün Kunrad tarafından çalınan voksun, kanınla büyülenmiş. Eserin bir hortum gibi çalışması ve konteyneri her kim açarsa açsın o ve etrafındakilerin ruhunu çekmesi gerekiyorken saldırının asıl darbesi, makûs talihli geminin mürettebatını vurmuş. Eserde kalan etkiler, sana ciddi bir zarar verebilecek kadar güçlü değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise you have fallen under the effects of the artefact. It appears that your vox was enchanted with your own blood, which Kunrad stole on the day of your confrontation. The artefact was supposed to work like a siphon, draining the soul of whoever opened the container and of everyone around them — but the crew of the ill-fated ship took the brunt of the attack. The residual effects of the artefact are not strong enough to do you any serious harm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eserin etkisi altında olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa karşı karşıya geldiğiniz gün Kunrad tarafından çalınan voksun, kanınla efsunlanmış. Eserin bir hortum gibi çalışması ve konteyneri her kim açarsa açsın onun ve etrafındakilerin ruhunu çekmesi gerekiyormuş ancak saldırının asıl darbesi makûs talihli geminin mürettebatını vurmuş. Eserde kalan etkiler sana ciddi bir zarar verebilecek kadar güçlü değil.{/n}
